GSD.product_version: versions from v4.12 to before v5.10.163
GSD.description:
dm integrity: Fix UAF in dm_integrity_dtr()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.163 by commit a506b5c92757b034034ef683e667bffc456c600b, it was introduced in version v4.12 by commit 7eada909bfd7ac90a4522e56aa3179d1fd68cd14. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: dm integrity: Fix UAF in dm_integrity_dtr()
